segments.text: Hello , I need to make a dinner reservation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell me what night you will be coming ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We will be coming to your restaurant on Tuesday night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What time will you be dining with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many guests will be in your party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Four of us will be coming .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please just give me your name , and at 7
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! Our last name is Foster .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , Mr . Foster , see you this Tuesday at 7
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I look forward to having dinner at your restaurant . Thank you for your help .
segments.speaker: S2
